articles.title: Trump Signs Executive Order Rebranding DOD as 'Department of War'
articles.description: President Trump has signed an executive order to rebrand the Department of Defense as the 'Department of War'. This move has sparked discussion and analysis regarding its potential implications.

articles.title: RFK Jr.'s contentious hearing with senators
articles.description: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. faced a contentious hearing with senators, discussing various policy points and his approach to transparency and evidence-based policy.

articles.title: 475 workers detained in major ICE raid at US Hyundai factory
articles.description: Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) detained approximately 475 workers during a raid at a Hyundai Motor manufacturing plant in Georgia, focusing on employment practices by suppliers and contractors.
